                    <div id="dnn_ContentPane" class="grid_8"><div class="DnnModule DnnModule-DNN_HTML DnnModule-14298"><a name="14298"></a>

<div class="c_DNN6 c_DNN6_Header">
	
	<div class="pc-common">
		<div class="pc-header"><h1><span id="dnn_ctr14298_dnnTitle_titleLabel" class="Head">The Hybrid Shop</span>


</h1></div>
		<div class="pc-body">
			<div id="dnn_ctr14298_ContentPane" class="wrapper"><!-- Start_Module_14298 --><div id="dnn_ctr14298_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr14298_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
		<p><img width="197" height="148" src="http://assets.netdrivenwebs.com/img/custompages/hybrid-shop.jpg" style="float: left; margin: 8px;" alt="Hybrid Service Gainesville VA" /></p>
<p>Do you find yourself in need of hybrid repair?</p>
<p>At Curry's Auto Service, we offer a comprehensive line of hybrid maintenance services to keep your hybrid running like new. As one of the leading hybrid repair shops for customers in Gainesville, VA, Alexandria, VA, Arlington, VA, and other surrounding areas, we pride ourselves on quality maintenance services that are designed to improve the performance of your hybrid vehicle, including hybrid battery repair and hybrid battery replacement.</p>
<p>Hybrid electric vehicles (HEVs) combine an internal combustion engine and one or more electric motors. The benefits of hybrid cars are numerous. Hybrids use several tricks of the trade in order to improve fuel economy and emissions, including using specially designed tires and wheels, lighter body styles, regenerative braking, and engine start and stop features, among others. Hybrid gasoline engines (ICEs) feature electronic throttle controls, variable valve timing, lean burn combustion designs, which makes them more complex, and more challenging to repair and service. Despite the sophisticated nature of hybrid systems, technicians should be qualified for routine hybrid vehicle service before you trust them to handle your hybrid repairs and services.</p>
<p>As trusted hybrid mechanics, we offer:</p>
<p><strong>Comprehensive State-of-Health High Voltage Diagnostic Service</strong></p>
<ul>
    <li>Power and energy testing of the high voltage battery</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Electrical and diagnostic inspection of hybrid transmission, rotor and stator of the hybrid drive motor and generator</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Test and analyze transmission drive motor/power inverter system</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Test and analyze hybrid charging system (DC to DC convertor)</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Inspection of all cabling from battery packs for breakage, cuts, and wear</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Includes road test</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Hybrid Battery Repair</strong></p>
<ul>
    <li>Power and energy of hybrid battery system, bringing battery to zero state-of-charge (cycling battery) and bringing battery back up to the proper, full state-of-charge</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Includes inspecting all cabling from battery packs for breakage, cuts, and wear</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Includes two cycles</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>High Voltage Cable Inspection and Repair</strong></p>
<ul>
    <li>Cables are vital to ensure efficient operation of your hybrid vehicle</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Inspect all cabling from the battery packs for breakage, cuts, or wear</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Repair and replace cables as needed</li>
</ul>
<ul>
    <li>Price may vary with parts required and labor time</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="http://www.currysauto.com/appointments/schedule-an-appointment.aspx"><img width="115" height="115" alt="Hybrid Service Alexandria, VA" style="float: right; margin: 8px;" src="http://assets.netdrivenwebs.com/img/custompages/hybrid-shop-2.jpg" /></a></p>
<p>Our service staff can perform diagnostic services to pinpoint the exact problem plaguing your hybrid vehicle. With our comprehensive state-of-health and battery conditioning service, you will experience increased fuel economy, vehicle performance, and cost savings. We have years of experience with hybrid maintenance. Stop in today to get your hybrid serviced, or give us a call at <strong>(703) 753-1650</strong> to schedule an appointment.</p>
	</div>

</div><!-- End_Module_14298 --></div>
